summary: This document appears to be an email from Jeffrey Epstein expressing a sentiment about keeping an island, suggesting a potential need for it in the future. The email is marked as confidential and is associated with JPMorgan Chase.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, expressing a hope that the island will be kept.

keyFacts: The email was sent by Jeffrey Epstein.
The subject of the email indicates a discussion about an island.
The email is marked as confidential and relates to JPMorgan Chase.
